scripts.build-dev: npm run build && npm run build-showroom
scripts.build-showroom: cd showroom/ && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.test: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es6.js && karma start karma.conf.es6-modules.js && karma start karma.conf.es5.js && npm run test:syntax
scripts.test:es5: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es5.js
scripts.test:es5:local: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es5.js --local && npm run test:syntax
scripts.test:es6: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es6.js
scripts.test:es6:local: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es6.js --local && npm run test:syntax
scripts.test:es6-modules: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es6-modules.js
scripts.test:es6-modules:local: npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es6-modules.js --local && npm run test:syntax
scripts.test:es5:sauce: TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER=1 && npm run build && karma start karma.conf.es5.js
